definition[0]: a method of buying goods in which you give the seller of the goods a small amount of money to keep the goods until you can pay the full price
example[0]: I put the dress on layaway.
definition[1]: a method of buying goods in which the buyer makes a first payment that is a percentage of the price and the goods are kept by the seller until the full price is paid
example[1]: Jerry bought some furniture on a layaway plan.
example[2]: I put a sofa bed on layaway at the K Mart in Santa Clara.
